intro: Decaspermum austrohainanicum, commonly known as the Hainan decaspermum, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly known as the buckwheat family. The plant is characterized by its erect stems and small, clustered flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as mountainous regions. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and taxonomic studies.
